instructions: Launch Fitbit from your phone's home screen. Tap the pink update banner displayed on screen. You'll see this banner only if an update is available. Follow the on-screen instructions and keep the device close to your synced phone or tablet. If you update at midnight, you may see incorrect steps for the following 24 hours. Try to avoid this time of day for updates. You're done!

Launch your browser and navigate to Google Play Music . Log in using the same Google account linked to your Android device. Click the Menu icon located in the top left corner, click Upload music . Click Select from your computer and choose the songs you'd like to add. Once the songs have been uploaded, launch the Google Play Music app on your Android device. You'll now be able to play your music when you have an active internet connection. Otherwise, you'll need to download the songs from Google Play Music to play them offline.
